mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jumei2.jm_bt_deal_old ( channel_id, product_code, deal_id, start_time, end_time, user_purchase_limit, shipping_system_id, product_long_name, product_medium_name, product_short_name, search_meta_text_custom, syn_flg, jumei_hash_id, special_activity_id1, shelf_id1, special_activity_id2, shelf_id2, special_activity_id3, shelf_id3, defer_date_flg, defer_fail_msg, created, creater, modified, modifier, jm_bt_product_id ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{productCode}, #{dealId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{userPurchaseLimit}, #{shippingSystemId}, #{productLongName}, #{productMediumName}, #{productShortName}, #{searchMetaTextCustom}, #{synFlg}, #{jumeiHashId}, #{specialActivityId1}, #{shelfId1}, #{specialActivityId2}, #{shelfId2}, #{specialActivityId3}, #{shelfId3}, #{deferDateFlg}, #{deferFailMsg}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier}, #{jmBtProductId} )
